item.title: Melania Trump reveals White House holiday decorations and her theme
item.description: Melania Trump has decorated the White House for the holidays, and her theme is “Home Is Where the Heart Is.”

item.title: Pope to visit Christian sites in Lebanon; encourages Christians not to abandon region
item.description: Pope Leo XIV visits holy sites in Lebanon on Monday, drawing Christians and Muslims

item.title: Brian Walshe goes on trial in death of wife who disappeared more than 2 years ago
item.description: A Massachusetts man is set to go on trial in the death of his wife, Ana Walshe, who disappeared over two years ago

item.title: Luigi Mangione fights to exclude gun, notes as anniversary of UnitedHealthcare CEO’s killing nears

item.title: US futures slip and Asian stocks are mixed, while oil prices surge more than $1 a barrel
item.description: Asian shares have started the week mixed, with Tokyo's benchmark falling nearly 2%
